        name - hotel's name

        address - hotel's address
        numberOfSingleRooms - hotel's number of single rooms
        singleRoomPrice - hotel's price of single rooms
        numberOfDoubleRooms - hotel's number of double rooms
        doubleRoomPrice - hotel's price of double rooms
        numberOfTripleRooms - hotel's number of triple rooms

        numberOfApartments - hotel's number of apartments
        apartmentPrice - hotel's price of apartments
